::Zardus::

Zardus nods at Lady Hawk's answer, seeing that she wasn't going to 
provide more information.

"And to protect that technology is the reason you attacked Squizzy," 
he states, "But she's safe and under protection. What will you do 
now?"

He turns his head as Wheeljack enters, and smiles at the robot's 
report.

"Excellent! I have something else for you to do as well." He says, 
data downloading into a datapad from his datatracks. "Can you build a 
small repair/recharge station on the island? You can use the CR 
chambers and other materials from the old Alliance base. Have the 
Lavacons help you build, they're available right now."

He tosses the datapad to Wheeljack. On it were the basic specs, plus 
the places in the old Alliance base where he could get the CRs. The 
station was designed to be a quick recharge point during defensive 
battles. It was easilly accessable, and would be powered directly from 
the old Alliance base. "Those are the specs and other info. Do you 
think you can do it?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron:::
> 
> ::He finds Zardus::
> Wheeljack: Zardus, sir.
> ::he salutes::
> Wheeljack: Composer and i are pleased to tell you that the new 
defenses are a 
> success.  I sent out test drones to simulate an attack on the base, 
and now 
> all of those test drones are destroyed.  The Iron Fist should now be 
able to 
> ward off almost anything.
> ~~~~~
> ::Banzai-Tron evaded the bolt::
> Banzai-Tron: Is that your best shot?
> ::He manuvers in the air and fires off 2 missle
